Source: appthemes/FontStyles.js

import {Platform} from 'react-native';

const fontFaktSoftProNormal = (Platform.OS === 'ios') ? "FaktSoftPro-Normal" : "FaktSoftProNormal"
const fontFaktSoftProMedium = (Platform.OS === 'ios') ? "FaktSoftPro-Medium" : "FaktSoftProMedium"
const fontFaktSoftProBlond = (Platform.OS === 'ios') ? "FaktSoftPro-Blond" : "FaktSoftProBlond"
const fontFaktSoftProSemiBold = (Platform.OS === 'ios') ? "FaktSoftPro-SemiBold" : "FaktSoftProSemiBold"

const fontNeutraDispMedium = (Platform.OS === 'ios') ? "NeutraDispMedium" : "NeutraDispMedium"
const fontNeutraDispTitling = (Platform.OS === 'ios') ? "NeutraDispTitling" : "NeutraDispTitling"

// TODO all caps
/**
 * This file exports the FontStyles object which defines all the design font profiles
 * Each font profile has font size and font family used at runtime for texts
 */ 
export default FontStyles = {
	FontProfile01 : {
		fontSize: 32,
		fontFamily: fontFaktSoftProMedium,
	},
	FontProfile02 : {
		fontSize: 18,
		fontFamily: fontFaktSoftProMedium,
	},
	FontProfile03 : {
		fontSize: 18,
		fontFamily: fontFaktSoftProNormal,
	},
	FontProfile04 : {
		fontSize: 16,
		fontFamily: fontFaktSoftProMedium,

		fontFamily: fontFaktSoftProNormal,
